      • setStartTime

        public void setStartTime(java.lang.String beginTime)
        This sets the start time for the current zone as the value provided. The start time is for activating the sprinklers in this zone.
        Parameters:
        beginTime - The String value that should be set as the start time of the current zone

      • setStopTime

        public void setStopTime(java.lang.String endTime)
        This sets the stop time for the current zone as the value provided. The stop time is for stopping the activated sprinklers of this zone.
        Parameters:
        endTime - The String value that should be set as the stop time of the current zone
